SummaryEnglish: Koala writes about daily life, whether it's good or bad, happy or sad. Koala treats every day as a precious day.

1.TitleEnglish: The Beginning of the Picture Diary
1.SummaryEnglish: Koala writes about daily life, whether it's good or bad, happy or sad. Koala treats every day as a precious day. Koala believes that today is a good day, and tomorrow will be a good day too.
